short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser addon to receive notifications for the game 'Red Alert 3'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser addon to receive notifications of Red Alert 3 games.

    Features:
    - Audible and visual notification of rooms with your favorite maps.
    - Audible and visual notification of rooms with your favorite titles.
    - Audible and visual notification when the game room is full.
    - Simple design.
    
    More features coming soon!
    
    IMPORTANT: You must open the site https://cnc-online.net to start monitoring.
